main event: A luminous disc was observed in the sky by several residents of Soeaux, France on October 8, 1965, around 8:30 p.m.
interesting points: The object was round, white in color, and about the size of an aircraft., The object hovered motionless for several minutes before suddenly accelerating at a very high speed., The sighting lasted about 15 minutes., Several witnesses confirmed the observation., The object made no noise during its appearance.
